sentences.english: I was baffled that some ofthe most basic workplace blunders seem to be tripping people up!
sentences.chinese: 许多最基本的职场失误会让他们摔跟头，这让我困惑。

sentences.english: A lot of Occidentals feel puzzled to this question.
sentences.chinese: 许多西方人对此感到困惑不解。

sentences.english: Petroleum industry is one of industrial systems which is puzzled by metal corrosion.
sentences.chinese: 石油工业是最受金属腐蚀问题困惑的工业之一。

sentences.english: Unsurprisingly, the reaction he received from passers-by was one of complete  bewilderment.
sentences.chinese: 不出所料的是，当时与他擦身而过的人是多么的困惑。

sentences.english: Though ‘clitoris’ was still a source of confusion.
sentences.chinese: 虽然“阴蒂”这个词仍是一个造成困惑的源头。

sentences.english: Confusion isn’t a bad thing. It means you’re growing and thinking.
sentences.chinese: 困惑不见得是坏事，那表示你在思索和成长。

sentences.english: Life can be messy and confusing, but it's also full of surprises.
sentences.chinese: 生活有时乱如麻，让人困惑，但有时也充满惊奇。

sentences.english: They're a bit foxed by the colours of the riders' jerseys and hats.
sentences.chinese: 自行车手运动衫和帽子的颜色让他们有点儿困惑。

sentences.english: It was a puzzling remark and still leaves me a little puzzled.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个令人迷惑的描述，仍然让我感到一点儿困惑。

sentences.english: Unsurprisingly, the reaction he received from passers-by was one of complete bewilderment.
sentences.chinese: 不出所料的是，当时与他擦身而过的人是多么的困惑。

sentences.english: She then confounds me by sitting down to eat the free meal.
sentences.chinese: 她之后坐下吃免费餐食的行为则让我困惑。

sentences.english: Yet I am still confused by the decision.
sentences.chinese: 但我对于这项决定仍然感到困惑。

sentences.english: She was still puzzling over this problem when she reached the office.
sentences.chinese: 她来到办公室时还在为这个问题而感到困惑。

sentences.english: Investigators were baffled by the killings and the absence of a motive.
sentences.chinese: 调查人员对杀戮行为本身及其动机的缺乏感到困惑。

definition: to not understand/to be puzzled by/indissoluble
to pace back and forth/to hesitate/to be indecisive
not knowing what to do (idiom); at one's wits' end/embarrassed and at a complete loss
